variables.name: Income
variables.description: Total taxable income for Northwest Territories 2025 tax calculation.

variables.name: Bracket_1
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 1: 5.9% on the portion of income up to $51,964. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_2
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 2: 8.6% on the portion of income over $51,964 up to $103,930. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_3
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 3: 12.2% on the portion of income over $103,930 up to $168,967. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_4
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 4: 14.05% on the portion of income over $168,967. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: FinalTaxes
variables.description: Sum of Bracket_1 through Bracket_4 in numerical order. Includes zeros from brackets that do not apply. Calculation must always add all four brackets explicitly.

rules.translation: FinalTaxes is greater or equal to 0
